rl.photoviewer.model

Class PhotoExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.photoviewer.model.PhotoExporter

  • public class PhotoExporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to copy and rename files.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int currIndex
      Number which is incremented when exporting a photo.

      Part of the file name template after the dot.
      (package private) java.lang.String numFormatString
      Something like '000'.

    • Field Detail

      • destDir

        java.io.File destDir

      • namePrefix

        java.lang.String namePrefix
        Part of the file name template in front of the number. Value null means renaming is disabled.

      • nameSuffix

        java.lang.String nameSuffix
        Part of the file name template after the dot. E.g. 'jpg'.

      • numFormatString

        java.lang.String numFormatString
        Something like '000'.

      • currIndex

        int currIndex
        Number which is incremented when exporting a photo.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhotoExporter

        public PhotoExporter()

    • Method Detail

      • setDestination

        public void setDestination(java.io.File destDir,
                  java.lang.String destFileNameTemplate)
        Expects a directory and a file name template of the form first prefix then optionally number then optionally suffix. E.g. 'Scotland2012-005.jpg', 'Scotland2012-.jpg', 'Scotland2012-'.
        Parameters:
        destFileNameTemplate - possibly null (copy without renaming).

      • copyFiles

        public int copyFiles(java.util.List<java.io.File> files)
        Copies the specified files to the previously specified destination directory. If a file name pattern was provided, the files are renamed accordingly.
        Returns:
        Number of copied files.

      • getDestFileName

        private java.lang.String getDestFileName(java.lang.String sourceFileName)
